Header.title: MK Web
Header.paragraph1: Cloud Computing Development with Microsoft Azure and Amazon Web Services
Header.paragraph2: Freelance Web Developer based in Hyderabad, India. Highly experienced in designing & developing responsive Websites | Web Applications | Mobile Friendly.

About.paragraph: Mohd Kaleem Pasha, holding good experience with software development in industry. Ready to work on Freelance project.

Services.name: Website Development
Services.text: The web development process involves taking the graphical elements defined in the design process and coding them into a prefer framework.

Services.name: Logo Design
Services.text: Our goal is to design a professional yet creative logo that reflects your company’s spirit and leaves a lasting, memorable effect.

Services.name: App Design
Services.text: Our approach is to create an app design that strengthens your company’s brand while ensuring ease of use and simplicity for your audience.

Services.name: Responsive Website Design
Services.text: Having a responsive layout means that your website fluidly resizes for optimal viewing regardless of the screen size or device (e.g. iPhone, iPad).

Services.name: SEO (Search Engine Optimisation)
Services.text: SEO is the practice of improving and promoting a website in order to increase the number of visitors it receives.

Services.name: Social Media Integration
Services.text: Social media integration enables your website to post updates to Facebook, displays a Twitter feed, and links to your social media accounts.
